start.text: Weapons online, engines at full burn. Ready for action.
All systems nominal, full combat readiness.
The crew is ready for battle and awaiting your orders, commander.
Ready to strike down the foes of Humankind. Just give us the target, commander.

start_boss.text: Stay focused, this enemy is more dangerous than the others.
Analyse its weakpoints and commence a focused strike.
No time for heroics, work as a team this time, or die alone.
Our crew is always with you, commander. Even this foe will not be the end of ours.

retreat.text: The odds are against us, commander. Retreat is advised.
The crew's safety is the priority, retreating.
Some battles aren't meant to be won. No need to sacrifice lives for nothing.

out_of_missiles.text: Out of missiles. Switching to other weaponry.
Missiles depleted. Redirecting power to remaining systems.
Missile ordnance has been depleted. Ready to close the distance.

engaged.text: Engaging enemy, combined strike is suggested.
All power to combat systems, closing on the enemy.
Enemy units engaged. Commencing combat maneuvers.

need_help.text: Backup is requested, the enemy is pushing us.
Asisstance is required, the enemy forces are prevailing.
Commander, we need reinforcements in this grid square!

pursuing.text: Target locked, proceeding with the strike.
Suggest combined strike against the marked opponent.
Don't let the target escape. Focus the offensive.

running.text: Enemy forces are advancing. Changing our position.

hull_90.text: Our hull has been slightly damaged.
Our vessel has sustained damage. Vital systems still functional.
Armor and hull have been scratched. Nothing to worry about, commander.

hull_50.text: Hull at 50%. Damage control teams have been deployed.
Hull down to 50%. Significant damage has been sustained, but the vessel is still operational.
Hull at half integrity. We can still pull it through, commander.

hull_30.text: Hull integrity at 30%! Engineering suggests immediate retreat, commander!.
The vessel has been severely damaged! Requesting allowance to retreat!
Multiple breaches detected! We won't hold on for much longer, commander!
Crew evacuation protocols active! Leave not a soul behind!
Commander, the crew is in critical danger! We need backup!

overload.text: Flux grid overloaded, the vessel is partially inoperational.
Flux control systems are down, requesting covering fire.
Flux capacitors are out. We'll be back in action in a moment, commander.

death.text: The reactor is about to explode, abandon ship!
Abandon ship! I repeat, abandon sh-...

victory.text: Yet another victory. We're proud to serve you, commander.
All that training at the Aerospace Academy has certainly paid off.
